ygData.subject: Re: Why do YOU want to be a cleric?
ygData.msgSnippet: I am on Fennin Ro and if i could find out how to fight a beast of yellow con by all means i would like to see how. Lady Bree Nightingale ... From: Mr. J
ygData.messageBody:
I am on Fennin Ro and if i could find out how to fight a beast of yellow con
by all means i would like to see how.

Lady Bree Nightingale
-----Original Message-----
From: Mr. J Daniels <warpig@...>
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, June 02, 1999 12:06 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Why do YOU want to be a cleric?


>From: "Mr. J Daniels" <warpig@...>
>
>I wish I knew why everyone was having such trouble :). I have solo'd up
>to yellow undead. The only time I have any major problems is if my spells
>do minimal damage a cpl times and I run out of mana, or there is more than
>1 undead on me. Hrmmm. What server you on, maybe I can show you what
>I do sometime. Its a shame you can't solo. It is fun to get away from
>the heal med heal med routine sometimes. (Well I still med between fights
>but you know what I mean. :) ).
>
>
>Mr. J Daniels
>
>
>On Wed, 12 May 1999, Heather M. Daley wrote:
>
>> From: "Heather M. Daley" <blushn@...>
>>
>> I also agree with this, being a lvl 26 cleric even i find it close to
>> impossible to solo anything.....now that i have the Dismiss spell i can
take
>> a low blue dry dones out without difficulty, but soloing is just not a
real
>> choice for clerics.....find yourself a good tank preferrably a Ranger,
>> paladin, or warrior IMO that is a few lvls higher than you <so taunt
works>
>> and the Creatures don't pound you too hard.....very hard for a lower
level
>> tank at times to get a beasts attention especially undead after you have
>> unloaded a world of hurt on them.
>>
>> -----Original Message-----
>> From: Allsar <bogey@...>
>> To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
>> Date: Tuesday, June 01, 1999 9:45 PM
>> Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Why do YOU want to be a cleric?
>>
>>
>> >From: "Allsar" <bogey@...>
>> >
>> >Right now i've a recently level 20 dark elf cleric. Clerics are, and i
>> must
>> >stress this, NOT soloers! Even against undead, lets say you fight an
even
>> >level dry bone, needless to say he has a 3/4 chance of kicking your ass
:)
>> >My role in a group consists of healing and expulsing/smiting, my melee
is
>> >just in there for fun. Also, my two hand blunt skill is at 3 i believe,
>> but
>> >since in a group youre a healer and not a tank, it is fully easy for you
to
>> >raise your skill while not taking damage.
>> >Theres my 10 coppers.
>> >Allsar Olath`Vlos - 20th cleric - Brotherhood of the Spider - Rathe
>> >-----Original Message-----
>> >From: David Burger <david.burger@...>
>> >To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
>> >Date: Tuesday, June 01, 1999 4:50 PM
>> >Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Why do YOU want to be a cleric?
>> >
>> >
>> >>From: "David Burger" <david.burger@...>
>> >>
>> >>Interesting point you bring up about your Elven Cleric. I played an
Elven
>> >>Cleric up to level 11. I stopped because I was having problems raising
my
>> >>two-handed blunt up from 0. I started a Dwarven Cleric and have seen
the
>> >>difference. I can solo pretty good and I can definitely back a fighter
if
>> >>needed. The problem with my first character was that I didn't have the
>> >>strength to do the damage and carry the gear that my Dwarf can. So I
>> guess
>> >>you kind of have to make the choice to be a back up fighter in the
>> >>beginning. Interesting points though.
>> >>
>> >>David
>> >>a.k.a Doro on FenninRo
>> >>
>> >>-----Original Message-----
>> >>From: Alvarez, Ruben (consultant) [mailto:ruben.alvarez@...]
>> >>Sent: Tuesday, June 01, 1999 2:01 PM
>> >>To: 'EQ-Clerics@onelist.com'
>> >>Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Why do YOU want to be a cleric?
>> >>
>> >>
>> >>From: "Alvarez, Ruben (consultant)" <ruben.alvarez@...>
>> >>
>> >>I dont think clerics can hold their own at all. (besides undead) IMHO
I
>> am
>> >>a level 13 High Elf cleric. Our offensive spells dont do that much
damage
>> >at
>> >>all. I have read about the higher level offensive spells, and they
dont
>> >>really impress me. I love being a cleric saving lives and getting the
>> >>thanks from everyone. Pretty much we cant solo. (which I dont mind at
>> >all)
>> >>I want to be in a group. When I play I must get a couple /tells an
hour
>> >>asking me if I am in a group. Or some high level asking me to heal
500+
>> >>HP's. All I really want is appreciation. Depending on their level I
do
>> >>charge a small fee for a cure or a heal. Usually what I do if they do
>> give
>> >>me something depending how much, I will cure/heal the rest of the
period I
>> >>am playing. I think everyone will agree with me that being a cleric
you
>> >are
>> >>going to be poor! Like I said, I am level 13 and have about 2/5 of
banded
>> >>armor. When I see other classes have full banded and a fine steel
weapon.
>> >>I was forced to move locations from Oasis which doesn't give much loot
at
>> >my
>> >>level to Black Burrow. I didn't mind the move at all. I plan to stay
in
>> >BB
>> >>until I get full banded armor all of my level 14 spells and maybe a
fine
>> >>steel hammer. I have to look up the stats for that. Then I will
probably
>> >>move back to the Oasis. Well I am rambling right now plus there is
work
>> to
>> >>do. Safe Journeys!
>> >>
>> >>Qanin
>> >>The Humble Healer
>> >>The Rathe
>> >>
>> >>
>> >>
>> >>-----Original Message-----
>> >>From: David Burger [mailto:david.burger@...]
>> >>Sent: Tuesday, June 01, 1999 4:47 PM
>> >>To: eq-clerics@onelist.com
>> >>Subject: [EQ-Clerics] Why do YOU want to be a cleric?
>> >>
>> >>
>> >>From: "David Burger" <david.burger@...>
>> >>
>> >>Let's get some content flowing on this list shall we? Let's start with
>> why
>> >>you want to be a cleric.
>> >>
>> >>With me it was a simple choice. I like to be able to help people.
There
>> >is
>> >>nothing like coming upon someone locked in a life or death battle and
>> >>swaying the tide to their side. I don't do it for any reward other
than
>> >the
>> >>thank you I receive. It is good to know that you helped.
>> >>
>> >>I also like the fighting abilities of the Cleric. Although not as good
as
>> >>the Warrior or the Paladin, Clerics can definitely hold their own.
>> >>
>> >>David
>> >>
>> >>a.k.a. Doro on FenninRo
>> >>
>> >>
>>
